title: Enhancing Software Development Practical Competencies: Flexible Self-Directed Learning for Pre-Service Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the procedure for establishing a school facility maintenance plan with 80% accuracy.
Learners can perform simulations to prioritize maintenance tasks within budget constraints based on real-world scenarios.
Learners can identify at least three potential risk factors using a safety inspection checklist.
Learners can operate a digital maintenance record management system using only mobile devices.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
